LanguageData.VGE_Apparel_Vacsuit_Prestige.label: prestige vacsuit
LanguageData.VGE_Apparel_Vacsuit_Prestige.description: A protective suit that keeps the user safe in the vacuum of space. The suit restricts the wearer's movement, considerably reducing their movement speed.\n\nExpensive and beautiful, prestige vacsuits like this is usually made for those of high status in the royal navy. Embedded eltex threads also enhance the wearer's psychic sensitivity.
LanguageData.VGE_Apparel_VacsuitHelmet_Prestige.label: prestige vacsuit helmet
LanguageData.VGE_Apparel_VacsuitHelmet_Prestige.descr: A helmet that efficiently recycles the user's oxygen, allowing them to breathe in the vacuum of space for hours at a time. The process isn't perfectly efficient, so the user must periodically return to a pressurized environment.\n\nExpensive and beautiful, prestige vacsuit helmet like this is usually made for those of high status in the royal navy. Embedded eltex threads also enhance the wearer's psychic sensitivity.
